test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_MobileIOS_REQ-001_Login_TEST_Mobile_Valid Credentials

Steps.Step Description: Open the application on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the login screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The login screen is displayed with username and password fields.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid username and password, then tap on 'Login'.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in successfully and redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: User should have a registered account with valid credentials.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is logged in and dashboard is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers the successful login scenario; does not cover login failure.

test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_MobileIOS_REQ-001_Logout_TEST_Mobile_Logout Process

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the application using valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and the dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Locate and tap the 'Logout' button on the dashboard.
Steps.Expected Result: User is prompted with a confirmation dialog.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm logout from the prompt.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged out and redirected to the login screen.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in to the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is successfully logged out and the login screen is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the logout process but not the session expiry or timeout.

test_cases.Title: User Registration Functionality_MobileIOS_REQ-003_Registration_TEST_Mobile_Valid Data

Steps.Step Description: Open the application on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the registration screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The registration screen is displayed with input fields.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in all required fields with valid data and submit the registration form.
Steps.Expected Result: User receives a confirmation message that registration was successful.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is not currently logged in and is on the registration screen.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user data: Name: John Doe, Email: john.doe@example.com, Password: password123
test_cases.Expected Result: User's account is successfully created and a confirmation message is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers registration success; does not cover email verification or registration failure.

test_cases.Title: e-stration_Special_SuperEnalotto_001_Legal_DOMAIN_TEST_Desktop_Testing the organizational aspects of SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto

Steps.Step Description: Review the decree regarding the organization and management of SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto.
Steps.Expected Result: The document outlines organizational structure and operational processes.

Steps.Step Description: Identify the key roles mentioned in the decree for managing the SiVinceTutto.
Steps.Expected Result: Key roles and responsibilities are clearly identified.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm that the legal requirements for the operation of SiVinceTutto are documented.
Steps.Expected Result: Legal requirements are provided as per decree.

test_cases.Preconditions: Access to the relevant legal documents regarding SiVinceTutto.
test_cases.Expected Result: The legal compliance requirements of SiVinceTutto are fully understood and documented.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the legality of organizational structure, does not assess operational effectiveness.

test_cases.Title: Definition_Agency_001_Web_TEST_Desktop_Check_the_definition_of_Agency

Steps.Step Description: Access the official website of the Agenzia delle dogane e dei monopoli.
Steps.Expected Result: The home page of the Agenzia's website is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section containing definitions related to games and lotteries.
Steps.Expected Result: The definitions page is displayed, including the definition for 'Agency'.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the definition for 'Agency' as described in the requirement.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Agency' is defined as 'Agenzia delle dogane e dei monopoli'.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet and the Agenzia's official website.
test_cases.Expected Result: The accurate definition of 'Agency' is displayed.

test_cases.Title: GameDefinition_Combination_002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verify_definition_of_game_combination

Steps.Step Description: Go to the official website of the Agenzia delle dogane e dei monopoli.
Steps.Expected Result: The website loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Find the section where game definitions are listed.
Steps.Expected Result: The game definitions section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the definition of 'combinazione di gioco'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Combinazione di gioco' is defined as 'the twelve numbers predicted and played by the player'.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have internet access.
test_cases.Expected Result: 'Combinazione di gioco' is correctly defined.

test_cases.Title: GameDefinition_WinningCombination_003_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verify_definition_of_winning_combination

Steps.Step Description: Open the Agenzia delle dogane e dei monopoli website.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the definitions section.
Steps.Expected Result: The definitions section is accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Search for the definition of 'combinazione vincente del SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Combinazione vincente del SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto' is defined as 'the six whole numbers between 1 and 90 drawn at random during a specific draw'.

test_cases.Preconditions: User should be able to access the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: 'Combinazione vincente' is defined correctly.

test_cases.Title: Mobile_Login_001_Requirement_Functional_TEST_Mobile_ValidUserCredentials

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The mobile application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a valid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The username and password fields are filled without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Press the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the Home page.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a valid account and the app installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and the Home page is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only successful login functionality; error cases not included.

test_cases.Title: Mobile_Login_002_Requirement_Functional_TEST_Mobile_InvalidUserCredentials

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The mobile application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Enter an invalid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The username and password fields are filled without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Press the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the app installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: An error message appears, preventing access to the Home Page.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only invalid login scenarios; session persistence not included.

test_cases.Title: Mobile_PasswordReset_001_Requirement_Functional_TEST_Mobile_SuccessfulPasswordReset

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The mobile application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Forgot Password' option.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Forgot Password' page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a registered email address and submit.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating a password reset email has been sent.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a registered email account.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset process is successfully initiated.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers initiating the reset process; link verification not included.

test_cases.Title: Winning Numbers Extraction_001_REQUIREMENT_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Desktop_Validate the extraction of winning numbers

Steps.Step Description: Trigger the extraction process for the SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto.
Steps.Expected Result: The system initiates the extraction without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that six unique numbers between 1 and 90 are extracted.
Steps.Expected Result: Six unique numbers are displayed and are within the range of 1 to 90.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the same number is not extracted more than once.
Steps.Expected Result: No duplicate numbers are present in the extracted results.

test_cases.Preconditions: System is ready for extraction; no prior extractions have been made.
test_cases.Expected Result: Six unique winning numbers are extracted correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the successful extraction process of six numbers.

test_cases.Title: Winning Categories Assessment_002_REQUIREMENT_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Desktop_Verify correct prize categories assignment

Steps.Step Description: Define a set of user numbers that match various winning categories.
Steps.Expected Result: User numbers are prepared according to winning categories.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the defined user numbers for assessment.
Steps.Expected Result: The system accepts the user numbers without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Check the assigned categories based on the user numbers matched.
Steps.Expected Result: Categories are correctly assigned according to the predefined rules.

test_cases.Preconditions: Winning numbers have been extracted successfully.
test_cases.Dataset: User numbers that correspond to various winning categories.
test_cases.Expected Result: User numbers are correctly assessed, and corresponding categories are assigned.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies the assignment of categories; does not evaluate the win probabilities.

test_cases.Title: Cancellation Due to Force Majeure_003_REQUIREMENT_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Desktop_Verify cancellation handling process

Steps.Step Description: Simulate a force majeure scenario preventing extraction.
Steps.Expected Result: The system recognizes the force majeure and prepares for cancellation.

Steps.Step Description: Check if notifications about the cancellation are sent to players.
Steps.Expected Result: All players are notified about the cancellation via the prescribed channels.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the refund process for players affected by the cancellation.
Steps.Expected Result: Players can successfully initiate refunds for entries made prior to cancellation.

test_cases.Preconditions: System is set to the force majeure status.
test_cases.Dataset: User entries that need to be refunded.
test_cases.Expected Result: Cancellation is handled appropriately, and players receive refunds as needed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Handles cancellation only; does not cover pre-extraction checks.

test_cases.Title: game stake and prize distribution_001_Regulations_prize_distribution_TEST_Web_overview of prize distribution rules

Steps.Step Description: Review the game stake amount.
Steps.Expected Result: The stake amount of €5.00 is confirmed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the structure of a game combination.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is confirmed to consist of twelve numbers, irrespective of order.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the distribution percentages of the total prize pool.
Steps.Expected Result: The following percentages are confirmed for prize distribution: 32.20% (first category), 3.40% (second category), 8.20% (third category), 31.00% (fourth category), 25.20% (fifth category).

test_cases.Preconditions: The application containing game regulations is accessible.
test_cases.Expected Result: All aspects of the game stake and prize structure are verified to be accurate.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the primary prize pool distribution; does not include edge cases.

test_cases.Title: prize distribution in absence of winners_002_Regulations_distribution_rules_TEST_Web_evaluation of prize distribution conditions

Steps.Step Description: Assume no winners in the first prize category. Review the prize distribution.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize distribution reflects the given percentages: 3.40% (second category), 8.20% (third category), 36.50% (fourth category), 51.90% (fifth category).

Steps.Step Description: Assume no winners in the first and second prize categories. Check the reallocated distribution.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize distribution updates to 10.00% (third category), 37.00% (fourth category), 53.00% (fifth category).

test_cases.Preconditions: The application is set up to simulate no winners in specified categories.
test_cases.Expected Result: The prize distribution logic correctly adapts to the absence of winners as per the outlined rules.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates the distribution percentages; does not include user notification mechanisms.

test_cases.Title: winners prize division_003_Regulations_winner_distribution_TEST_Web_analysis of multiple winner scenarios

Steps.Step Description: Configure a scenario with multiple winners in the same prize category.
Steps.Expected Result: The total prize of that category is confirmed to be equally divided among all winners.

Steps.Step Description: Check the calculation of the prize division among multiple winners.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize amounts are accurately computed, ensuring that each winner receives an equal share.

test_cases.Preconditions: Simulation of multiple winners within the application must be enabled.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample prize amounts and winner counts
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize distribution among winners is executed correctly as per the stated rules.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on distribution logic without addressing user interface presentation.

test_cases.Title: Test_LoginFunctionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop_Login to the web application

Steps.Step Description: Access the web application homepage.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage is displayed with the login option available.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The login form is displayed on the screen.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a valid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The username and password fields are populated successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Press the 'Submit' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the dashboard or home page after successful authentication.

test_cases.Preconditions: User needs to have a registered account.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only successful login; does not cover error handling for invalid credentials.

test_cases.Title: Test_LogoutFunctionality_002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Logout from the web application

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is logged in.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is successfully logged in with access to the dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Logout' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The system processes the logout request.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the application behavior after logout.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the homepage, and the login button is available.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs out and returns to the homepage.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only logout functionality; session invalidation checks not included.

test_cases.Title: Participation_Scenario_001_Vendita_Fisica_TEST_Desktop_Testing participation at physical sales points

Steps.Step Description: Go to a physical sales point.
Steps.Expected Result: The physical sales point is accessible and the terminal is operational.

Steps.Step Description: Choose to fill out a participation card manually.
Steps.Expected Result: The participation card form is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in the required fields on the participation card.
Steps.Expected Result: The form accepts the input without validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the participation card.
Steps.Expected Result: The participation card is submitted successfully and confirmation is provided.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is physically present at the sales point and has valid participation options.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully fills and submits the participation card.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only filling and submitting participation cards; no automation is involved.

test_cases.Title: Participation_Scenario_002_Voice_Disposition_TEST_Terminale_Testing participation via voice instructions

Steps.Step Description: Approach the terminal and request an operator.
Steps.Expected Result: The operator is available and responsive to the user's request.

Steps.Step Description: Impart voice instructions to the operator for game participation.
Steps.Expected Result: The operator correctly interprets and acknowledges the voice instructions.

Steps.Step Description: Verify if the participation is recorded in the system.
Steps.Expected Result: The system confirms that the participation has been successfully recorded.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is at the terminal and ready to communicate with the operator.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully imparts voice instructions and participation is recorded.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only voice instruction participation; no information on how participation is logged.

test_cases.Title: Participation_Scenario_003_Distant_Play_TEST_Web_Testing participation in remote gameplay

Steps.Step Description: Access the online gaming platform.
Steps.Expected Result: The online gaming platform loads correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Register or log in to the user account.
Steps.Expected Result: User is able to register/log in without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Select the remote game to participate in.
Steps.Expected Result: The game selection screen displays available games accurately.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the participation request.
Steps.Expected Result: Confirmation of successful participation is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid account and has internet access.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user credentials and game options
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully participates in a remote game.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the remote game participation process; does not include payment validations.

test_cases.Title: Subscription_Scenario_004_Abbonamento_PLAY_TEST_Desktop_Testing subscription feature

Steps.Step Description: Go to the subscription section on the platform.
Steps.Expected Result: The subscription section is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Select the subscription option and fill in required details.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields accept valid inputs without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the subscription form.
Steps.Expected Result: The form is submitted successfully with confirmation shown.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with a valid account.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully subscribes to the gaming service.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the subscription process without testing subscription renewal processes.

test_cases.Title: game_receipt_creation_001_Revenue_reporting_APP_TEST_mobile_creating game receipt in mobile app

Steps.Step Description: Place a bet in any available game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The bet is successfully placed and a confirmation is received.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the terminal to generate the game receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: A game receipt is generated and is available to the player.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the receipt data against the original bet.
Steps.Expected Result: The receipt contains all the required fields such as game combinations, control codes, draw date, etc.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have an account and be logged in to the app.
test_cases.Expected Result: The game receipt is correctly generated with all required data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests the receipt generation process, not the validation upon withdrawal.

test_cases.Title: game_receipt_correctness_002_Validation_APP_TEST_mobile_verifying receipt correctness

Steps.Step Description: Receive a game receipt from the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The receipt is successfully displayed to the player.

Steps.Step Description: Compare the receipt details with the originally placed bet.
Steps.Expected Result: If there is a discrepancy, the player should have the option to request cancellation.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to cancel the receipt if discrepancies are found.
Steps.Expected Result: Cancellation is processed only if the original receipt is returned.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an active bet and has received the corresponding receipt.
test_cases.Expected Result: Receipt discrepancies are correctly identified, and cancellation requests are processed according to rules.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the validation process and cancellation requests.

test_cases.Title: receipt_mode_of_play_003_Management_APP_TEST_mobile_logging game played mode

Steps.Step Description: Access the game options in the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The game options menu is displayed with various modes of play.

Steps.Step Description: Select a mode of play and initiate a game.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected mode of play is initiated successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Place a bet during the game.
Steps.Expected Result: The bet is recorded according to the selected play mode.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in to the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system records the play and generates records accurately.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests only the initiation of gameplay and not the outcome of the game.

test_cases.Title: Minimum Cost Validations_001_GIocate_Caratura_TEST_Desktop_Validating the minimum cost of the ticket

Steps.Step Description: Open the game application and navigate to the ticket purchasing section.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket purchasing interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a ticket of special caratura.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket selection is successful, and the cost is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the displayed cost is at least €5.00.
Steps.Expected Result: The cost of the ticket is €5.00 or more.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the game application.
test_cases.Expected Result: The ticket purchasing process correctly enforces the minimum cost of €5.00.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only ticket cost validation; does not include winning validation.

test_cases.Title: Non-Cancellation of Tickets_002_GIocate_Caratura_TEST_Desktop_Verifying non-cancellation policy

Steps.Step Description: Purchase a caratura ticket for the game.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is successfully purchased.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to cancel the purchased ticket.
Steps.Expected Result: Cancellation action is blocked or denied with an error message.

Steps.Step Description: Check the purchased ticket status.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket remains valid and active.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has successfully purchased a caratura ticket.
test_cases.Expected Result: Users are not allowed to cancel tickets once purchased, ensuring ticket validity.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers non-cancellation only; does not test the refund policy.

test_cases.Title: Unclaimed Winnings Distribution_003_GIocate_Caratura_TEST_Desktop_Testing unclaimed winnings

Steps.Step Description: Simulate unclaimed winnings at the closure of a lottery event.
Steps.Expected Result: The application recognizes unclaimed winnings.

Steps.Step Description: Check the system's processing of unclaimed winnings.
Steps.Expected Result: Reported winnings are marked for distribution to charities.

Steps.Step Description: Validate that notified charities are visible in the reporting system.
Steps.Expected Result: The report lists all charities selected by the operator for the winnings distribution.

test_cases.Preconditions: Lottery event has ended and winnings distribution process is ready.
test_cases.Expected Result: Unclaimed winnings are correctly processed for charity distribution.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests winnings processing; does not include the full charity selection process.

test_cases.Title: Control Commission verification_001_Control Commission_Test_Desktop_Verifying the control commission functionality

Steps.Step Description: Log in as a control commission member.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is logged in and directed to the control committee dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the extraction operations verification section.
Steps.Expected Result: The extraction operations verification page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select an extraction operation to verify.
Steps.Expected Result: Details of the selected extraction operation are shown.

Steps.Step Description: Submit verification for the selected extraction operation.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicating successful verification is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be a member of the control commission with appropriate access rights.
test_cases.Expected Result: The control commission member can successfully verify extraction operations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers verification process for extraction operations only.

test_cases.Title: Winning Determination Verification_002_Winning Determination_Test_Desktop_Verifying winning determination functionality

Steps.Step Description: Log in as a control commission member.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is logged in and directed to the control committee dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the winning determination verification section.
Steps.Expected Result: The winning determination verification page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a winning determination to verify.
Steps.Expected Result: Details of the selected winnings determination are shown.

Steps.Step Description: Submit verification for the selected winning determination.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicating successful verification is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be a member of the control commission with appropriate access rights.
test_cases.Expected Result: The control commission member can successfully verify winning determinations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers verification process for winning determinations only.

test_cases.Title: Commission Member Composition_003_Commission Member Composition_Test_Desktop_Verifying composition rules of the committee

Steps.Step Description: Access the commission member management section.
Steps.Expected Result: Commission member management interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review the current composition of the control commission.
Steps.Expected Result: The list of current commission members is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that there are at least two members present.
Steps.Expected Result: The composition adheres to the requirement of having at least two members.

Steps.Step Description: Check the roles of the members.
Steps.Expected Result: The roles of the members such as president and secretary are properly assigned.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to commission member management functionalities.
test_cases.Expected Result: The commission is verified to have the correct composition based on the provided rules.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the verification of member roles and presence only.

test_cases.Title: official_bulletin_001_Requirement_Bollettino_Ufficiale_TEST_Web_Verifying the publication of the official bulletin

Steps.Step Description: Verify the publication of the official bulletin on the website the day after the drawing operations.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin is successfully published on the website.

Steps.Step Description: Check the contents of the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin contains the winning combination, prize pool amount, number of winning plays per prize category with respective amounts, ticket receipt identifiers for first and second category winnings, and the date of drafting.

test_cases.Preconditions: The drawing operations have been completed, and the official bulletin data is ready for publication.
test_cases.Dataset: Official bulletin data containing winning combination, prize amounts, and ticket identifiers.
test_cases.Expected Result: The official bulletin is published with all required details correctly displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the publication process; does not include the actual drawing or calculations.

test_cases.Title: official_bulletin_distribution_002_Requirement_Bollettino_Ufficiale_TEST_Web_Verifying distribution to physical points of sale

Steps.Step Description: Observe the distribution of the official bulletin to physical sales points concurrently with its publication on the website.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin is successfully sent to all physical sales points.

Steps.Step Description: Check that physical sales points display the official bulletin publicly.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin is visibly posted at each physical sales point.

test_cases.Preconditions: The official bulletin has been successfully published on the website.
test_cases.Dataset: List of physical sales points for bulletin distribution.
test_cases.Expected Result: The official bulletin is distributed to all specified physical sales points and correctly displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on distribution process; does not validate bulletin content at points of sale.

test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop_User Login Test

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the Login page of the web application.
Steps.Expected Result: The login page is displayed with username and password fields.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The input is accepted without any errors.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user has a valid account and is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is logged in and redirected to the dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers successful login scenario; does not include error scenarios.

test_cases.Title: Password Reset Process_002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Password Reset Test

Steps.Step Description: Go to the 'Forgot Password' link on the Login page.
Steps.Expected Result: Redirected to the Password Reset page.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a registered email address in the password reset form.
Steps.Expected Result: Email address is accepted with no error messages.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Submit' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message appears indicating that a password reset email has been sent.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a registered email address.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset email is successfully triggered.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers password reset initiation; does not cover email functionality or password change verification.

test_cases.Title: User Registration Functionality_003_Web_TEST_Desktop_User Registration Test

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the User Registration page.
Steps.Expected Result: The registration form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Fill out the registration form with valid user information.
Steps.Expected Result: All input fields are filled without validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the registration form.
Steps.Expected Result: User is redirected to a confirmation page indicating successful registration.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User registration is completed successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers successful registration; does not include edge cases like duplicate emails.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_001_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying payment process for winnings

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid winning ticket at the Concessionaire's prize office.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is accepted for processing.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the ticket amount is below or equal to €1,000,000.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment is processed within 30 days.

Steps.Step Description: Receive the payment in the form of a non-transferable bank check or bank transfer.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment is successfully received.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment processed within 30 days.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test mainly verifies the payment process and does not cover ticket validation.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_002_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying high amount winning payments

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid winning ticket at the Concessionaire's prize office for an amount greater than €1,000,000.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is accepted for processing.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the amount is greater than €1,000,000.
Steps.Expected Result: User is informed that payment will be processed within 91 days.

Steps.Step Description: Receive the payment confirmation with details on bank transfer.
Steps.Expected Result: The bank transfer is initiated successfully.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket amounting to over €1,000,000.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment processed within 91 days.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the high amount winning payments, additional transaction checks not included.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_003_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying payment through authorized points

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid winning ticket at an authorized payment point for an amount under or equal to €520.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment is accepted in cash or bank check.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm the payment method at the point of sale.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment is successfully completed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket with a win amount of €520 or less.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket amount equal to or less than €520
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment completed successfully at point of sale.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on payments through authorized points; does not address payments over €520.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_004_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying payment for intermediate values

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid winning ticket for an amount between €520.01 and €5,200.
Steps.Expected Result: The authorized payment point handles the payment correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Receive payment confirmation.
Steps.Expected Result: User receives the payment in cash or via non-transferable bank check.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket with an amount between €520.01 and €5,200.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment is processed successfully at the authorized payment point.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers winnings between €520.01 and €5,200; excludes higher ticket values.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_005_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying payment after maximum presentation period

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to present a winning ticket after 90 days since publication.
Steps.Expected Result: The system rejects the ticket as invalid due to expiration.

Steps.Step Description: Review system message regarding the expiration of receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: User receives an appropriate message about the validity period.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket but tries to present it after the deadline.
test_cases.Expected Result: Receipt is marked as expired; payment cannot be processed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test focuses only on expiration handling; does not verify other payment methods.

test_cases.Title: win_payment_006_PAYMENT_Process_TEST_Desktop_verifying interest on late payments

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid winning ticket for payment after the normal processing time.
Steps.Expected Result: The system calculates the interest due on the late payment.

Steps.Step Description: Request confirmation of the total amount payable including interest.
Steps.Expected Result: User receives total amount including legal interest.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid winning ticket that is past the payment deadline.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is informed of the interest that will be added to the total payment.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Examines interest for late payments; does not cover initial payment processing.

test_cases.Title: Complaint Submission_001_vincite_FUNCTIONALITY_TEST_Desktop_Submitting a complaint for winnings

Steps.Step Description: Open the complaints submission form on the official website.
Steps.Expected Result: The complaints submission form is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in the required information: complaint details and attach a copy of the gaming receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields accept input without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the complaint via registered mail or by hand.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message appears indicating that the complaint has been submitted.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to a valid complaint submission form.
test_cases.Expected Result: Complaint is submitted successfully and confirmation is received.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers submission process only; no validation of received complaints included.

test_cases.Title: Complaint Response_002_vincite_FUNCTIONALITY_TEST_Desktop_Verifying complaint response timeline

Steps.Step Description: Submit a complaint regarding a winnings dispute.
Steps.Expected Result: Complaint is logged into the system.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for 60 days after submission.
Steps.Expected Result: No errors occur during this waiting period.

Steps.Step Description: Check for a response from the authority regarding the complaint.
Steps.Expected Result: A response is received within 60 days.

test_cases.Preconditions: A valid complaint must have been submitted previously.
test_cases.Expected Result: Response regarding the complaint is received within the specified timeline.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers response timeline only; does not include content of the response.

test_cases.Title: Complaint Rejection_003_vincite_FUNCTIONALITY_TEST_Desktop_Verifying rejection reasons for complaints

Steps.Step Description: Submit a complaint that lacks necessary motivation.
Steps.Expected Result: Complaint is logged into the system.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the authority to process the complaint.
Steps.Expected Result: No errors should occur during processing.

Steps.Step Description: Check for rejection notification due to insufficient motivation.
Steps.Expected Result: Notification of rejection is received with reasons specified.

test_cases.Preconditions: A complaint must be submitted that is intentionally lacking motivation.
test_cases.Expected Result: The authority rejects the complaint and provides reasons.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on rejection handling; does not cover appeals or further actions.

test_cases.Title: Overseas Collection Approval_001_Government Approval_TEST_Desktop_Verify the approval process for overseas collection

Steps.Step Description: Submit an application for overseas collection approval to the relevant government authority.
Steps.Expected Result: Application is submitted successfully, and the user receives a confirmation message.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the government authority to process the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is processed within the stipulated time frame.

Steps.Step Description: Check the status of the application through the provided government channel.
Steps.Expected Result: The application status is updated, reflecting either approval or rejection.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is registered and authorized to submit applications.
test_cases.Expected Result: The overseas collection application is either approved or rejected after processing.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the application process only; does not include appeal processes.

test_cases.Title: Rejection Notification_002_Government Approval_TEST_Desktop_Verify rejection notification for overseas collection

Steps.Step Description: Submit an application for overseas collection approval.
Steps.Expected Result: Application submission is successful.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the government authority to review and process the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is processed.

Steps.Step Description: Follow up to check the application status.
Steps.Expected Result: Receive a notification if the application is rejected.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is registered and authorized to submit applications.
test_cases.Expected Result: User receives details regarding the rejection of the application.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the rejection notification process only; appeal process not included.

test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_TEST_Web_Desktop_Performing user login with valid credentials

Steps.Step Description: Open the application login page in a web browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The login page should be displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The credentials should be accepted without any validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The user should be redirected to the home page.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a valid account and is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and is taken to the home page.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only successful login; invalid credentials are not tested.

test_cases.Title: User Login Invalid Credentials_TEST_Web_Desktop_Verifying user login with invalid credentials

Steps.Step Description: Open the application login page in a web browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The login page should be displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter an incorrect username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The credentials should trigger a validation error.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message indicating invalid credentials should be displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the application opened.
test_cases.Expected Result: User receives an error message and remains on the login page.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only invalid login attempts; edge cases not explored.

test_cases.Title: Application Decree Abrogation_001_Requirement_Application Decree Abrogation_TEST_Web_Publishing of the new decree

Steps.Step Description: Access the official website of the Agenzia.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage of the Agenzia is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Look for the latest publication of the decree.
Steps.Expected Result: The latest decree is listed and accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the old decree (n. 2011/39740) is no longer listed.
Steps.Expected Result: The old decree is not present on the website.

test_cases.Preconditions: Access to the internet and the official website.
test_cases.Expected Result: New decree is published, old decree abrogated.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies the publication state; does not test legal compliance.

test_cases.Title: Decree Effectivity Date_002_Requirement_Effectivity Date_Test_Web_Verify the effective date of the new decree

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the published decree section on the Agenzia website.
Steps.Expected Result: The published decrees section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the newly published decree.
Steps.Expected Result: Details of the selected decree are presented.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the effective date indicated on the decree.
Steps.Expected Result: The effective date matches the first indicated competition date.

test_cases.Preconditions: Access to the internet and the official website.
test_cases.Expected Result: Effective date is correctly displayed and matches the first competition date.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates the effective date; does not include checks for future applications.

test_cases.Title: signature verification_XXX_REGULATORY_Signature_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the printed signature is correctly displayed

Steps.Step Description: Open the document containing the printed signature.
Steps.Expected Result: The document is displayed without any errors.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the printed signature field in the document.
Steps.Expected Result: The printed signature field is clearly visible in the specified area.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the signature matches the user 'Alessandro Aronica'.
Steps.Expected Result: The signature displayed corresponds to the user's name and required format.

test_cases.Preconditions: The document with the printed signature must be available and accessible.
test_cases.Dataset: Document containing the signature of Alessandro Aronica
test_cases.Expected Result: The printed signature correctly matches the expected signature format.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only visual verification of the signature.

test_cases.Title: signature compliance check_XXX_REGULATORY_Signature Compliance_TEST_Desktop_Checking compliance of signature format

Steps.Step Description: Prepare a document with a printed signature field according to regulations.
Steps.Expected Result: The document is formatted correctly with a signature field.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the signature 'Alessandro Aronica' in the designated field.
Steps.Expected Result: The signature is entered without format issues.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the document for compliance verification.
Steps.Expected Result: The system verifies that the signature meets regulatory requirements.

Steps.Step Description: Review the compliance feedback from the system.
Steps.Expected Result: The compliance status is correctly reported as 'Compliant' or 'Non-Compliant' based on input.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the compliance verification system.
test_cases.Dataset: Signature information and regulatory compliance criteria
test_cases.Expected Result: The signature's compliance status is accurately determined by the system.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers compliance check; does not include workflow or related systems.
